meanings.sent1: The software is updatable, meaning it can be easily changed.
meanings.sent2: My phone is updatable, so I can install the latest features.
meanings.sent3: The updatable computer was always the first to get new tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an updatable database, constantly evolving.
meanings.sent5: The updatable map made navigation a breeze.

meanings.sent1: The updatable app notifies me when there are new versions available.
meanings.sent2: Our smart TV is updatable, ensuring we have access to the latest content.
meanings.sent3: The updatable robot was always excited to get new instructions.
meanings.sent4: His wardrobe was like an updatable playlist, always changing.
meanings.sent5: The updatable calendar kept us organized and on track.
